### Request for Proposal (RFP) Information

* **Notice Type**: Competitive RFP (Request for Proposal)
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Bidding Process**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Procurement Method**: Concurrent, Invitation Open to Tender
* **Selection Criteria**: None
* **Contract Period**: From the Effective Date of the Contract to March 31, 2023 (Initial Term)

### Solicitation Documents

* Documents are available online at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).
* The downloaded documents take precedence over any printed copies that may also be made available.

### Important Information
* This Request for Proposal (RFP) is to select a supplier to provide an Accessibility and Voter Experience Box for Elections Canada.
* The Contract, including the Statement of Work (SOW), outlines the specific goods and services required by Elections Canada.
* The period of the Contract will be from the Effective Date of the Contract until March 31, 2023 (the Initial Term).

### How to Obtain Further Information
* All enquiries and other communication with Elections Canada personnel must be directed ONLY to the Contracting Authority.
* The Contracting Authority will be the bidder’s primary contact. Bidders who contact anyone other than the Contracting Authority may be disqualified.
